variable.name: Version
variable.description: Version of the Illumina SNP chip on which the sample was run [V1=ILLUMINA_HumanHap550v1.1; V3= ILLUMINA_HumanHap550v3.0; V3Duo=ILLUMINA Human610_Quadv1_B]

variable.name: Ploidy
variable.description: DNA ploidy of the sample [diploid, hyperdiploid, unknown]

variable.name: MYCN
variable.description: Amplification status of MYCN gene in this sample [Amp=Amplified, No amp=Not amplified, Unknown]

variable.name: Risk
variable.description: Neuroblastoma Risk strata that this subject was classified into based on various clinical factors [high, intermediate, low, unknown]

variable.name: GENDER
variable.description: Gender of the subject [Female, Male, Unknown]

variable.name: INSS_stage
variable.description: Stage of the disease as per International Neuroblastoma Staging System(INSS) [Stage 1, Stage 2a, Stage 2b, Stage 3, Stage 4, Stage 4s, unknown]

variable.name: Ethnicity
variable.description: Ethnicity of the subject [Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, south or central American, Spanish, "Spanish NOS, Hispanic NOS", "Spanish NOS, Hispanic NOS, Latino NOSNon", "Spanish Surname only", "Unknown whether Spanish"
